Entries.Resort_Approach: Lookin' forward to exploring the island today!
Entries.Resort: Wish I could go wandering around a bit more today...brought my sword and everything...
Entries.Resort_Left: Ahh, nothing like a nice relaxing vacation...$h
Entries.Resort_Adventure: Looking forward to a day spent wandering in the wilderness...er, for some defintions of 'wilderness'.
Entries.Resort_Volcano: Wow! I wonder what monsters I can find in there?
Entries.Resort_Tent: Professor Snail showed me a bunch of really interesting fossils!
Entries.Resort_AdventureReturn: I can't wait to come back here! Wonder what else I'll find next?

Entries.Resort: Man, I love coming here! So many interesting things to explore!$h
Entries.Resort_Approach: @, I'll be off to Ginger Island today! You coming too?
Entries.Resort_Adventure: Dude, this place is super cool!
Entries.Resort_Tent: Man, I can see myself becoming an archeologist...maybe...
Entries.Resort_AdventureReturn: That was fun! But I'm glad to be headed home. I'm whacked!

Entries.Resort_Antisocial: Heya @, whatcha up to?#$b#Me? Just taking a break from all those people...#$b#Vacations are fun, but they're also tiring.
Entries.Resort_Antisocial_2: Glad I'm wearing this shirt. Otherwise, I'd definitely be sunburning right about now.

Entries.Resort_IslandNorth: @, I wish I had some time to study the unique folliage of this island today....
Entries.Resort_Adventure: I'm looking forward to analyzing the ecology of the island today!
Entries.Resort_Volcano: @, did you know that this volcano only appeared here about ten thousand years back?
Entries.Resort_Volcano_2: Volcanos can also form on other planets! The biggest one in the solar system is Olympus Mons on Mars.
Entries.Resort_Tent: Professor Snail was just telling me about all the unique shells he's collected over the years!
Entries.Resort_Tent_2: Oh, look at all these amazing mushrooms!
Entries.Resort_AdventureReturn: I can't wait to come back! So much more data to gather!

Entries.Resort_IslandNorth: @, have you looked at these coconut trees? Something's a little different about them...
Entries.Resort_Adventure: @, I'm looking forward to spending a day out here!
Entries.Resort_Volcano: I wonder if Dad will let me explore in there...Probably not.
Entries.Resort_Tent: This is making me want to become an archeologist!
Entries.Resort_AdventureReturn: Ah, that was a nice day! I'm ready to head home now, though.
Well, that was fun. I'll see you at home, @?

Entries.Resort_IslandNorth: Oh, @, I love the foliage here! Look at how the light shines through the trees!
Entries.Resort_Adventure: I brought my sketchbook and I'm definitely looking forward to getting some drawing done!
Entries.Resort_Tent: Professor Snail has such a wonderful collection of flowers!
Entries.Resort_Tent_2: Oh, look at how beautiful these old biology diagrams are!
Entries.Resort_Pier: This water is such a pretty shade of blue.
Entries.Resort_Antisocial: Heya @, how are you today? I'm just observing the sea. This would be so lovely to draw.

Entries.Resort_Leaving: Well, that was deeply relaxing. I'll see you at home, dear.$l
Entries.Resort_Adventure: Oh, hi, @! What are you planning on doing today?#$b#Me, I'm planning on drawing some of the birds on this island.
Entries.Resort_Antisocial: Oh, @, you've found me here. How are you today? The Resort is just a little too busy for me right now.
Entries.Resort_Pier: This water is such a pretty shade of blue. @, would you be interested in going snorkeling one day?

Entries.Resort_Approach: I'm definitely looking forward to going to the Resort today!$h
Entries.Resort_Left: Ahhh...I had a great day at the Resort!$h

Entries.Resort_Approach: I'm headed off to the Island today. Looking forward to going on vacation!
Entries.Resort_Left: Ah, nothing like a nice relaxing vacation...$h
Entries.Resort_Pier: The water's so blue here, isn't it?
Wish I brought my camera...#$e#Say, do you think Willy will let us go snorkeling?
Look at all the fish swimming in these waters!
Entries.Resort_Approach: @, I'm gonna be headed to Ginger Island today! Got a nice vacation day from the bus company.

Entries.Resort_IslandNorth: Did you see those birds? Aren't they lovely?
